people_also_ask.heading: "Doom" is still a licensed game and the only way to legally play it is by paying for and downloading the game from Gog.com. However, you can still download the original "Doom" for free by downloading a custom mod of the game, and a free game engine developed by fans of the original game engine.02-Dec-2020
